rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: A person also contracted it [the virus] after interacting with the cows—the first known case of H5N1 jumping to humans from another mammal.
A person also contracted it [the virus] after interacting with the cows—the first known case of H5N1 jumping to humans from another mammal.
